about_the_game:
Unleash Chaos in a Dystopian World:
Embark on a heart-pounding journey through a dystopian landscape ravaged by cataclysmic events. As humanity teeters on the edge of extinction, dive into the chaos that is the Blacklight Gang territory.

Your Mission:
In "Phantom Ascension," take on the role of a silent mercenary on a perilous quest to retrieve the stolen Quantum Orb. Navigate the disintegrating reality of the Blacklight Gang's domain, facing off against the tyrannical Bryce and his ruthless thugs.

Advanced Prototype Suit:
Equip yourself with an advanced prototype suit, a technological marvel that sets you apart in the midst of the apocalypse. Face overwhelming odds armed with a deadly melee weapon and cutting-edge capabilities.

Intense First-Person Hack and Slash:
Engage in relentless first-person hack and slash combat, where precision and strategy are your allies. Experience a unique blend of fast-paced action and strategic maneuvering as you confront the calamity head-on.

Specialized Techniques:
Master specialized techniques to outclass your adversaries. Use your high-tech suit to its full potential, executing nimble moves and devastating attacks that will leave enemies in awe.

Save Humanity, Confront the Chaos:
In "Phantom Ascension," you are always outnumbered but never outclassed. Confront the chaos head-on, employing your skills and advanced equipment to save what remains of humanity.

Key Features:


  • Intense first-person hack and slash gameplay
  • Navigate a disintegrating dystopian world
  • Advanced prototype suit with unique capabilities
  • Face off against the tyrannical Blacklight Gang
  • Master specialized techniques for strategic advantage
  • Dive into the chaos and emerge as the silent savior humanity desperately needs in "Phantom Ascension."

content_descriptors.notes:
Certainly! When addressing mature content in your game on Steam, you can provide information to customers by being clear and transparent. Here's a sample response for the "What should customers know about any mature content in your game?" section:

Mature Content Disclaimer:

"Phantom Ascension" features intense action sequences involving combat and killing. However, it's important to note that the game does not depict explicit gore or graphic violence. In our effort to provide an engaging experience without excessive visual elements, the depiction of combat results in a red screen effect, and defeated enemies disintegrate without graphic details.

Key Points:

Combat and Killing: Engage in intense first-person hack and slash combat throughout the game.
Visual Representation: The game employs a red screen effect during combat, ensuring that explicit blood or gore is not depicted.
Enemy Disintegration: Defeated enemies disintegrate without graphic details.
We strive to maintain an immersive experience while being mindful of explicit content. "Phantom Ascension" is designed to provide an exciting and challenging gameplay experience without the inclusion of graphic violence.

Please be advised that the game is intended for a mature audience, and player discretion is advised.

Unleash Chaos in a Dystopian World:

name: Phantom Ascension

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K/AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050Ti/AMD Radeon R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: *"FPS (frame rate/second): Stable over 30" is guaranteed. *Frame rate may drop when other applications are running in the background.*Please note that minimum and recommended specifications are subjected to changes without notice.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K/AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard/Onboard chipset
  • Additional Notes: *"FPS (frame rate/second): Stable over 60" is guaranteed. *Frame rate may drop when other applications are running in the background.*Please note that minimum and recommended specifications are subjected to changes without notice.

short_description: Dive into the intense "Phantom Ascension," a single-player action game set in a dystopian 20XX. With unchecked corporate power, crumbling governments, and rampant lawlessness, the Blacklight Gang, a coalition of criminals and mercenaries, seizes control, plunging the world into chaos.
